items.name: Cheeseburger
items.description: Juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles. Served on a toasted bun.

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Classic Neapolitan-style pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

items.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Grilled chicken breast topped with bacon, avocado, and garlic aioli. Served on a brioche bun.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and shaved Parmesan cheese, tossed with classic Caesar dressing.

items.name: Fish and Chips
items.description: Beer-battered cod served with fries, tartar sauce, and lemon wedges.

items.name: Pad Thai
items.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, bean sprouts, scallions, and peanuts, in a sweet and tangy sauce.

items.name: Mushroom Risotto
items.description: Creamy arborio rice cooked with mushrooms, white wine, and Parmesan cheese.

items.name: Taco Salad
items.description: Crispy tortilla bowl filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and salsa.

items.name: Veggie Burger
items.description: Plant-based burger patty topped with lettuce, tomato, and vegan mayo. Served on a whole wheat bun.

items.name: Pesto Pasta
items.description: Fusilli pasta tossed with homemade pesto sauce, cherry tomatoes, and Parmesan cheese.

items.name: Pesto Pasta
items.description: Fusilli pasta tossed with homemade pesto sauce, cherry tomatoes, and Parmesan cheese.

items.name: Pesto Pasta
items.description: Fusilli pasta tossed with homemade pesto sauce, cherry tomatoes, and Parmesan cheese.

items.name: Steak Frites
items.description: Grilled sirloin steak served with crispy French fries and a side salad.

items.name: Roasted Chicken
items.description: Half a chicken roasted with herbs and served with mashed potatoes and green beans.

items.name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
items.description: Spaghetti with homemade meatballs and marinara sauce, topped with Parmesan cheese.

items.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
items.description: Slow-cooked pulled pork with BBQ sauce and coleslaw, served on a brioche bun.

items.name: Chicken Alfredo
items.description: Fettuccine pasta with creamy Alfredo sauce and grilled chicken breast.

items.name: Greek Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, feta cheese, olives, and red onions, dressed with Greek vinaigrette.

items.name: BBQ Ribs
items.description: Slow-cooked pork ribs with BBQ sauce, served with baked beans and corn on the cob.

items.name: Shrimp Scampi
items.description: Linguine pasta with garlic butter shrimp, cherry tomatoes, and parsley.

items.name: Club Sandwich
items.description: Triple-decker sandwich with turkey, ham, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise, served with fries.
